Research Areas

My research focuses on developing innovative algorithms for medical image analysis and machine learning, with particular emphasis in the following core areas:

Medical Image Analysis

Developing advanced deep learning algorithms for medical image processing, segmentation, and classification. Current focus includes:

  • Histopathology image analysis
  • Multi-modal medical image processing
  • Automated disease detection and classification

Few-Shot Learning

Innovation in learning from limited data samples through:

  • Novel neural network architectures
  • Transfer learning strategies
  • Meta-learning approaches

Visual-Language Representation

Exploring the intersection of vision and language through:

  • Multi-modal learning frameworks
  • Cross-modal representation learning
  • Image text retrieval
